fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Corruption (Passive)**
*You are corrupted. Your Attack Power and Defense Power are halved every round.*

fields.name: Clipboard (Passive):
fields.value: *You have a clipboard. This clipboard can store values, specifically: Attack Power and Defense Power multipliers. You are aware of the value on the clipboard.*

fields.name: Copy (1x, Charge 55%):
fields.value: *Target a player. You cannot target the same player twice in a row. Set the Attack Power or Defense Power of that player to your clipboard.*

fields.name: Paste:
fields.value:
(0x, Charge 45%)
*Target a player, or yourself. Pick either your Attack Power or Defense Power. The multiplier in your Clipboard is added to the targeted player's Attack or Defense Power.*

fields.name: Cut (Locked, 0x, Charge 75%):
fields.value: *This ability is unlocked when you place in the top third. Target a player. You cannot target the same player twice throughout the entire game. Set the Attack Power or Defense Power of that player to your clipboard and set the target's Attack Power or Defense Power to 0.0x temporarily for the next two rounds. This ability is Astral.*

fields.name: Delete (1x, Charge 55%):
fields.value: *Attack a player with your Attack Power.*

fields.name: Wincon:
fields.value: Survive to see Town lose the game.
